prompts: Create a fighting-type Pokemon that excels in martial arts and has powerful legs.
Show me a humanoid Pokemon with a focus on kicking abilities and a lean physique.
Imagine a Pokemon design inspired by a martial artist, featuring striking poses and agility.
Generate a character that embodies speed and strength, with a sleek, athletic build.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in urban areas, showcasing unique fighting techniques.
Give me a design for a Pokemon that channels its energy into powerful kicks.
Design a Pokemon with a distinctively flexible body and a fierce competitive spirit.
